CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Conference"), "C", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Workshop"), "WK", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Conference Call"), "CC", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "e-Publication"), "PUB", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "ECCHO Business Committee Meeting"), "EB", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "ECCHO Hosted Session"), "E", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "ECCHO NCP Editorial Board"), "ENEB", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "ECCHO OPS Chairman"), "EOO", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "ECCHO OPS Committee Meeting"), "EO", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "General Session"), "GS", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "In-Person Meeting"), "IPM", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "In-Person Training"), "IPT", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Lunch-N-Learn"), "LL", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "NCP CE Workshop"), "EWK", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "NCP Evaluation of Pilot Items"), "EPI", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "NCP Guide Program"), "NCPG", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "NCP Partner Training"), "ETT", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "OnDemand"), "OD", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Roundtable"), "ERDT", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Seminar"), "S", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "User Group"), "UG", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Web Based Training"), "WBT", IF (ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Webinar"), "W", null )))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Session Type for ID
